BYD spearheads Chinese electric car push in Australia, a friendlier marketBYD and other Chinese automakers are bringing new electric car models in droves to Australia, a market where they haven't faced trade barriers and sales have surged due to EV subsidies and tax benefits as well as high gasoline prices. Tue, 05 Mar 2024 21:05:39 GMT OV6FYQO2QFMTHL2QSY5HX3KBME https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transport/bid-spearheads-chinese-electric-car-push-australia-friendlier-market-2024-03-05/Stella Qiu商业汽车与交通
Brembo "plays it by ear" with cagey 2024 sales forecastItaly's Brembo offered a cautious outlook on Tuesday, guiding for mid-single digit revenue growth this year, in line with its performance for 2023, as geopolitical and commercial tensions allow limited visibility on future business prospects. Tue, 05 Mar 2024 17:18:14 GMT KXO34QRYKFMJJAVCIIZLC23YQE https://www.reuters.com/business/auto-transportation/brembo-plays-it-by-ear-with-cagey-2024-sales-forecast-2024-03-05/Reuters商业汽车与交通
Lawmakers seek to force ByteDance to divest TikTok or face US banA bipartisan group of U.S. lawmakers introduced legislation on Tuesday that would give China's ByteDance about six months to divest popular short video app TikTok or face a U.S. ban. Global home prices set for a gentle climb in a tight market - Reuters pollHome prices in most major property markets will rise modestly this year and next, according to a Reuters poll of housing specialists, who expected the shortage of affordable homes to persist for at least another two to three years. Russia says it is considering putting a nuclear power plant on the moon with ChinaRussia and China are considering putting a nuclear power plant on the moon from 2033-35, Yuri Borisov, the head of Russia's space agency Roscosmos said on Tuesday, something he said could one day allow lunar settlements to be built.
